source:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
The debonair dame has lost something of great import.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
クラウンリフトの優雅な貴婦人は、探し物をしているようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_TODO_00<tab>ユールモアで優雅な貴婦人の装飾品を探す

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_TODO_01<tab>Return the jewelry to the debonair dame.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_TODO_01<tab>優雅な貴婦人に装飾品を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_001<tab>Pardon the imposition, but I am in desperate need of your assistance. I lost several pieces of jewelry that are ever so dear to my heart in the commotion, and I've been quite unable to locate them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_001必死で逃げるうちに大切な装飾品を失くしてしまいました……。
あの、もしよろしければ探していただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_003<tab>I am searching for a tiara emblazoned with my house's crest, an engraved necklace, and an amethyst ring. As you might guess, each is a family heirloom.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_003見当たらないのは、
に、……
それから、の合計3点ですわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_004<tab>I know not where I dropped them, out of my wits as I was at the time, but they cannot have vanished into thin air. They must be in the city somewhere, if only I had the faintest inkling of where to look...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_004どれも一族に伝わる、大切なものなのです。
このままでは、祖先に顔向けができません……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_005<tab>Please, might I beg your help? I would give anything to have them safely returned to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_005ユールモアのどこかにあるはずなのです……。
もちろん、お礼はご用意いたします！
どうかお願いいたします……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_006<tab>I apologize that I have no clearer idea of where I might have dropped them, but please, I need my heirlooms returned to me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_006ユールモアのどこかにあるはずなのです……。
旅のお方、どうかよろしくお願いします……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_100_010<tab>Were you able to locate any of my heirlooms?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_100_010<tab>見つかりましたでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_010<tab>Oh, my, you've found all three! There can be no mistake!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_010あぁ……これです！　間違いありません！
すべて見つけてきてくださるなんて、
なんとお礼を言ったらよいか……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_011<tab>“Seek but to serve” is inscribed here, you see? It was my family's motto long before we came to Eulmore. My grandmother taught me its meaning─that we ought always love others before ourselves, aid the poor and the downtrodden...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_011この紋章、当家のモットーがモチーフになっているそうなのです。
ユールモアに入る以前には、貧しい人々にも手を差し伸べる、
誇り高きモットーを掲げていたのだとか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_012<tab>And I see with clarity, now. It is <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> spirit that those of us in Eulmore have been lacking, and which we must reclaim. Like my ancestors─like you─we must learn to care for others regardless of the benefit to ourselves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_012ユールモアの市民も、これから変わらなければなりません。
私も祖先のように、そしてあなた様のように、
困っている方々がいれば、手を差し伸べられるようにならなければ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_013<tab>I know not how I can possibly thank you enough for this, but please believe that you have my eternal gratitude.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_013本当に、ありがとうございました。
心ばかりのお礼ですが、どうかお納めください。
